title: Dark Souls Bound by Blood
description: Welcome to the world of Vampires - Are you going to be taken into the world that you know, or will these authors take you to a place that you come to but you can never leave? What kind of twists and turns will they take you through? In this anthology, the 11 authors will show you the dark, gothic and seductive side of vampire lore.Join- Yvonne Mason - Eternity Is ForeverRhys Rowlyn - Bound By BloodAnnaMarie Gardner - A Night To RememberLetha Gene - RebornCeeCee Elaine - The Blood BroochMargy Millet - Damaged (Protectors Soulmate Book 1)Rae Hendricks - Blood & FleshCarol Dawn - Blood BondedLenore Danvers - Run, Little FoxSylvia Black - A Vampire's ThreatAngie Wilcox - Ancient One
author: Yvonne Mason
